meanings.definition: A genus of insects including bedbugs.
meanings.sent1: The cimex is a type of bug that can hide in your bed.
meanings.sent2: I found a cimex crawling on my mattress last night.
meanings.sent3: The cimex thought my bed was a five-star hotel!
meanings.sent4: The cimex, a tiny vampire of the insect world, sucks blood for its survival.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the cimex, the sneaky bug that loves to feed on humans while they sleep.

meanings.definition: A member of the genus Cimex.
meanings.sent1: The cimex I caught in the jar belongs to the Cimex genus.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of the cimex to understand its habits.
meanings.sent3: The cimex from the Cimex family was the star of the insect show.
meanings.sent4: She compared her ex-boyfriend to a cimex, always lurking around.
meanings.sent5: The cimex, a small bug with a big impact, can cause sleepless nights for many.
